scripts.test: clear && npx ts-node src/bash-helper.ts ls && head -n3 ~/.bash-helper.state || echo
scripts.pack: cd pack && npx pkg -t node14-linux -o ../bash-helper --compress GZip -c package.json bash-helper.js
scripts.deploy: npm run pack:prepare && npm run build && npm run pack && chmod a+x ./bash-helper
